content.raw:
You are right. Known issue, I wrote a short comment in [other issue](#!/osrf/drcsim/issue/368/please-release-packages-for-different-ros#comment-6328269) but it's better to leave this open with a proper title.

The two cases  you explained are different:

* We could workaround sdformat by defining a sdformat-provider dependency (virtual)
* I need to check bloom templates to workaround this problem, probably introducing a provider or alternative dependencies.
content.html:
You are right. Known issue, I wrote a short comment in other issue but it's better to leave this open with a proper title.

The two cases you explained are different:

  • We could workaround sdformat by defining a sdformat-provider dependency (virtual)
  • I need to check bloom templates to workaround this problem, probably introducing a provider or alternative dependencies.
